TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Keyboard extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性以存取鍵盤目前的狀態，例如目前已按下哪些按鍵，並提供方法將按鍵輸入傳送至使用中視窗。

span.span: Provides properties for accessing the current state of the keyboard, such as what keys are currently pressed, and provides a method to send keystrokes to the active window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard`物件提供電腦的鍵盤介面。The `My.Computer.Keyboard` object provides an interface to the computer's keyboard. 屬性`My.Computer.Keyboard`提供數個特殊按鍵的狀態資訊。The properties of the `My.Computer.Keyboard` provide information about the state of several special keys. `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法可讓您將金鑰傳送至作用中視窗中，它們已在鍵盤上輸入一樣。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method lets you send keys to the active window as if they have been typed at the keyboard. ## 工作Tasks 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Keyboard`物件。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Keyboard` object. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |將按鍵傳送至應用程式Send keystrokes to an application|[如何：啟動應用程式並且將按鍵輸入傳送至該應用程式 (Visual Basic)How to: Start an Application and Send it Keystrokes (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-start-an-application-and-send-it-keystrokes.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown`屬性來判斷是否按下電腦的 CTRL 鍵。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's CTRL key is pressed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AltKeyDown As Boolean
public: property bool AltKeyDown { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得指出 ALT 按鍵是否被按下的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the ALT key is down.

value.span: 如果 ALT 鍵已關閉。否則， 。

span.span: if the ALT key is down; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown`屬性來判斷電腦的 ALT 鍵是否按下。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's ALT key is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#23)]

public: property bool CapsLock { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得指出 CAPS LOCK 是否已開啟的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether CAPS LOCK is turned on.

span.span: A value: if CAPS LOCK is turned on; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會傳回只 CAPS LOCK 的狀態。Only the state of CAPS LOCK is returned. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock`屬性來判斷是否已開啟電腦的 CAPS LOCK。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock` property to determine if the computer's CAPS LOCK is turned on. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會傳回只 SCROLL LOCK 鍵的狀態。Only the state of the SCROLL LOCK key is returned. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock`屬性來判斷電腦的 SCROLL LOCK 鍵是否在上。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock` property to determine if the computer's SCROLL LOCK key is on. summary.span: 鍵盤上輸入一樣，請將一或多個按鍵輸入傳送至的使用中視窗中。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SendKeys(string keys) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

summary.span: 鍵盤上輸入一樣，請將一或多個按鍵輸入傳送至的使用中視窗中。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法會提供類似的功能和方法。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. `wait`引數是很有用，如果其他應用程式必須完成才能繼續執行您的應用程式。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有任何受管理的方法，以啟用另一個應用程式，您可以使用這個類別目前的應用程式中，以手動方式選取要傳送，機碼的視窗或使用 Windows API 方法，例如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`、 強制將焦點放在其他應用程式。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：呼叫 Windows Api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys`引數可以指定任何單一索引鍵或任何索引鍵，搭配 ALT、 CTRL 或 shift 鍵 （或這些機碼的任何組合）。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每個索引鍵由一或多個字元，例如`a`字元"a"，或`{ENTER}`的 ENTER 鍵。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要結合 SHIFT 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`+`（加號）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要結合 CTRL 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`^`（插入號）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要結合 ALT 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`%`（百分比符號）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重複的索引鍵，使用表單`{`*金鑰數目*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 您必須讓之間保留一個空格*金鑰*並*數目*。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 比方說，`{LEFT 42}`表示 「 按向的左鍵 42 次 」;`{h 10}`表示 「 按 'h' 10 倍。 」For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出的程式碼，可用來指定不會顯示當您按下 （例如 ENTER 或 TAB） 對應的索引鍵的字元。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |KeyKey|程式碼Code| |-|-| |退格鍵BACKSPACE|{退格鍵} 或 {BS}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |中斷BREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |CAPS LOCKCAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|{清除}{CLEAR}| |DELETEDELETE|{刪除} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下鍵DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |ENDEND|{END}{END}| |輸入 （數字鍵台）ENTER (numeric keypad)|{輸入}{ENTER}| |ENTERENTER|~| |ESCESC|{逸出} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |說明HELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |首頁HOME|{HOME}{HOME}| |INSINS|{插入}{INSERT}| |向左鍵LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |NUM LOCKNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |傳回RETURN|{RETURN}{RETURN}| |向右鍵RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |SCROLL LOCKSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TABTAB|{TAB}{TAB}| |向上鍵UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |透過 F15 F1F1 through F15|{F1} 到 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法將按鍵傳送至外部應用程式，[小算盤] 應用程式開始著手`Shell`函式。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Calculator application, started by the `Shell` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#25)] 如果找不到具有所要求處理序識別碼的應用程式，則會引發 例外狀況。A exception is raised if an application with the requested process identifier cannot be found. 呼叫 `Shell` 函式需要完全信任 ( 類別)。The call to the `Shell` function requires full trust ( class).

exception.span: 部分信任狀況存在所在使用者缺乏必要的權限。

span.span: A partial-trust situation exists in which the user lacks necessary permissions.

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

permission.span: 控制相關的使用者介面和剪貼簿的權限。

span.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the clipboard.

related.span: 逐步解說：呼叫 Windows Api

MemberSignature.Value: public void SendKeys (string keys, bool wait);
.method public instance void SendKeys(string keys, bool wait) cil managed
Public Sub SendKeys (keys As String, wait As Boolean)
public: void SendKeys(System::String ^ keys, bool wait);

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

param.name: wait
param.span: A ，指定是否要等待按鍵得到處理之前，應用程式繼續。

span.span: A that specifies whether or not to wait for keystrokes to get processed before the application continues.

summary.span: 鍵盤上輸入一樣，請將一或多個按鍵輸入傳送至的使用中視窗中。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法會提供類似的功能和方法。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. `wait`引數是很有用，如果其他應用程式必須完成才能繼續執行您的應用程式。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有任何受管理的方法，以啟用另一個應用程式，您可以使用這個類別目前的應用程式中，以手動方式選取要傳送，機碼的視窗或使用 Windows API 方法，例如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`、 強制將焦點放在其他應用程式。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：呼叫 Windows Api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys`引數可以指定任何單一索引鍵或任何索引鍵，搭配 ALT、 CTRL 或 shift 鍵 （或這些機碼的任何組合）。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每個索引鍵由一或多個字元，例如`a`字元"a"，或`{ENTER}`的 ENTER 鍵。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要結合 SHIFT 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`+`（加號）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要結合 CTRL 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`^`（插入號）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要結合 ALT 鍵，在之前使用的按鍵碼`%`（百分比符號）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重複的索引鍵，使用表單`{`*金鑰數目*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 您必須讓之間保留一個空格*金鑰*並*數目*。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 比方說，`{LEFT 42}`表示 「 按向的左鍵 42 次 」;`{h 10}`表示 「 按 'h' 10 倍。 」For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出的程式碼，可用來指定不會顯示當您按下 （例如 ENTER 或 TAB） 對應的索引鍵的字元。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |KeyKey|程式碼Code| |-|-| |退格鍵BACKSPACE|{退格鍵} 或 {BS}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |中斷BREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |CAPS LOCKCAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|{清除}{CLEAR}| |DELETEDELETE|{刪除} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下鍵DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |ENDEND|{END}{END}| |輸入 （數字鍵台）ENTER (numeric keypad)|{輸入}{ENTER}| |ENTERENTER|~| |ESCESC|{逸出} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |說明HELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |首頁HOME|{HOME}{HOME}| |INSINS|{插入}{INSERT}| |向左鍵LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |NUM LOCKNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |傳回RETURN|{RETURN}{RETURN}| |向右鍵RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |SCROLL LOCKSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TABTAB|{TAB}{TAB}| |向上鍵UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |透過 F15 F1F1 through F15|{F1} 到 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法將按鍵傳送至外部應用程式，[小算盤] 應用程式開始著手`Shell`函式。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Calculator application, started by the `Shell` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#25)] 如果找不到具有所要求處理序識別碼的應用程式，則會引發 例外狀況。A exception is raised if an application with the requested process identifier cannot be found. 呼叫 `Shell` 函式需要完全信任 ( 類別)。The call to the `Shell` function requires full trust ( class).

summary.span: 取得指出 SHIFT 鍵是否已按下的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a SHIFT key is down.

value.span: 如果 SHIFT 按鍵為已關閉。否則， 。

span.span: if a SHIFT key is down; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown`屬性，以判斷其中一個電腦的 SHIFT 鍵是否按下。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property to determine if one of the computer's SHIFT keys is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#47)]
